title: Boreal Wood Bow
summaries: The Boreal Wood Bow is a type of bow crafted from Boreal Wood. It is similar to the Wooden Bow, but it deals 2 more damage and has a higher velocity. Because Snow biomes are usually not too far from the initial spawn point, a Boreal Wood Bow can be a superior alternative to its standard counterpart.

Its best modifier is Demonic, as it does not have any knockback and thus cannot get modifiers that affect it. It can also get the Deadly modifier, which, while the Demonic modifier may provide the greatest damage per hit, grants a higher increase to the overall DPS.
